import React, { Component } from 'react'; import UserMenu from './include/user-menu' import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; class VirtualConsultation extends Component { state = { fullName: '', phoneNumber: '', emailId: '', datePicker: '', preferedTime: '', } handleChange = event => { this.setState({ [event.target.name]: event.target.value }) } handleSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault(); const postData = { fullName: this.state.fullName, phoneNumber: this.state.phoneNumber, emailId: this.state.emailId, datePicker: this.state.datePicker, preferedTime: this.state.preferedTime } axios({ method: 'post', url: 'http://localhost:3001/makeup/makeupconsultant', headers: {}, data: postData, }) .then(res => { alert(' successfully'); window.location = '/virtual-consultation'; }) .catch(res => { alert('failed'); }) } componentDidMount() { window.scrollTo(0, 0) } render() { return (

Our Beauty Experts are available to address all your beauty needs.

Get Expert Advice Online from
Beauty consultants

{/* */}
) } } export default VirtualConsultation;
